Micranthemum tweediei 'Monte Carlo'

Diff: Medium Light: High CO2: High

A premier carpeting plant that creates a dense, vibrant green floor. Essential for high-end aquascaping.

  • Temp: 20-28°C
  • Growth: Fast
  • pH: 6.0-7.5

Pogostemon helferi

Diff: Medium Light: Med/High CO2: Required

Distinctive star-shaped leaves. Adds a unique architectural texture to any hardscape transition.

  • Temp: 22-30°C
  • Growth: Medium
  • pH: 6.0-7.2
